title: Your 2022 Oscars Guide From WSJ Critics and Writers
sub_head: A collection of reviews and stories takes stock of this year’s nominations in advance of the March 27 Academy Awards.
body: The nominees for the 94th Academy Awards were announced this week. Below you’ll find a collection of excerpts from our critics’ reviews of the films contending for Best Picture, along with links to the Journal’s reviews and coverage of the movies in the running in the other categories.
